alert.note: Alert for Kauai North; Kauai Southwest; Maui Central Valley North; Maui Windward West; Molokai North; Molokai West; Molokai Windward; Niihau; Oahu North Shore; Waianae Coast; Windward Haleakala (Hawaii) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Surf Advisory issued December 22 at 9:25AM HST until December 24 at 6:00AM HST by NWS Honolulu
info.description: ...HIGH SURF ADVISORY FOR NORTH AND WEST FACING SHORES OF NIIHAU KAUAI OAHU AND MOLOKAI AND FOR NORTH FACING SHORES OF MAUI UNTIL 6 AM HST SATURDAY... .Overlapping swells of the current fading northwest (330 degrees) swell and forerunners of a fresh, large northwest (310 degrees) swell will maintain advisory level surf conditions through Friday before slowly declining. Yet another similar size northwest swell (310 degrees) is anticipated over the weekend which will likely require the extension of the advisory. ...HIGH SURF ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM HST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Surf 12 to 16 feet along north facing shores and surf 8 to 12 feet along west facing today. Surf building to 15 to 20 feet along north facing shores and 10 to 14 feet along west facing shores Friday. * WHERE...North and west facing shores of Niihau, Kauai, Oahu, Molokai and North facing shores of Maui. * WHEN...Until 6 AM HST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Moderate. Strong breaking waves and strong currents will make swimming dangerous.
info.instruction: Head all advice from ocean safety officials. When in doubt, don`t go out.
